snippet: After air-conditioning units fell out of two windows in a housing project on the Upper East Side in recent weeks the New York City Housing Authority is getting tough on residents’ attempts to stay cool.
abstract: After air-conditioning units fell out of two windows in a housing project on the Upper East Side in recent weeks the New York City Housing Authority is getting tough on residents’ attempts to stay cool.

headline.main: Amid Falling Air-Conditioners, City Battens Down on Proper Installation
